HCV diagnosis is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* HCV
* HCV diagnosis
* HCVStatus

#### Uses

HCV diagnosis is used by the model in the following places

* [Liver cancer](/model/LiverCancer)
* [Chronic liver disease](/model/Chronic_Liver_Disease)
* [Hepatitis](/model/Hepatitis)
